{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region|It|Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region}} was largely destroyed in an explosion long ago. The explosion left behind structures such as [[Allogravity-Condensed Water Bodies]] floating in the air. Scientists such as [[Edwin Eastinghouse]] were researching the properties of [[Arkhium]]. The institute is also the site of the [[Experimental Field Generator]] boss.<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/NUBIYZ_KQFc Version 4.1 Special Program]</ref></p>}}

====Stone Tablet====
:A stone tablet that stands in silence. Inscribed upon it are the names of the ancient Marechaussee Hunters and their deeds, unknown to the world.

==Variation of Debris and Metal==
{{Description|The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.<br>Deep below the surface of the water, behind a wall of iron, a different kind of life force began to surge.<br>But whether their destination is a castle in the sky or a deep-sea canyon, an adventurer never rests.}}
